propositions.text: 凡是碰触到这枚刻有“噬魂”二字的黑色玉佩的人，都会被吸入这块玉佩之中，沦为玉佩主人的魂奴。

concepts.name: 黑色玉佩
concepts.context: The object that triggers the supernatural event.

concepts.name: 噬魂
concepts.context: The inscription on the black jade pendant.

concepts.name: 魂奴
concepts.context: The state of being after being absorbed by the pendant.

concepts.name: 玉佩主人
concepts.context: The owner of the jade pendant who controls the soul slaves.

relations.source: 凡是碰触到这枚刻有“噬魂”二字的黑色玉佩的人
凡是碰触到这枚刻有“噬魂”二字的黑色玉佩的人

main_topics: Introduction to a mystical artifact and its consequence
hierarchy.structure: The document begins with a title and then a prologue. The prologue consists of a repeated legendary statement about a black jade pendant and its inscription 'Soul Devourer' (噬魂). Anyone who touches this pendant is absorbed into it and becomes a 'soul slave' (魂奴) to its owner.
